variables.SLACK_MCP_XOXC_TOKEN: Browser token (xoxc-...). Required if not using XOXP. Get from Slack web app's Network tab.
variables.SLACK_MCP_XOXD_TOKEN: Browser cookie (xoxd-...). Required with XOXC. Get from Slack web app's cookies.
variables.SLACK_MCP_XOXP_TOKEN: OAuth user token (xoxp-...). Alternative to XOXC/XOXD. Get from Slack app settings.
variables.SLACK_MCP_API_KEY: Bearer token for SSE/HTTP auth. Optional for stdio.
variables.SLACK_MCP_USER_AGENT: Custom User-Agent for Enterprise Slack. Optional.
variables.SLACK_MCP_CUSTOM_TLS: Enable custom TLS handshake. Set 'true' for Enterprise. Optional.
variables.SLACK_MCP_SERVER_CA_INSECURE: Trust all certs (NOT RECOMMENDED). Default: false
variables.SLACK_MCP_ADD_MESSAGE_TOOL: Enable message posting. Options: 'false' (disabled), 'true' (all channels), 'C123,C456' (whitelist), '!C123' (blacklist). Default: false
variables.SLACK_MCP_ADD_MESSAGE_MARK: Auto-mark sent messages as read. Set 'true' to enable. Default: false
variables.SLACK_MCP_ADD_MESSAGE_UNFURLING: Enable link unfurling. Options: 'true' (all), 'github.com,slack.com' (whitelist). Default: false
variables.SLACK_MCP_LOG_LEVEL: Log level: debug, info, warn, error, panic, fatal. Default: info
